snippet: The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau on Monday proposed rules that would arm homebuyers with a simple accounting of how much their loan is likely to cost them.
abstract: The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau on Monday proposed rules that would arm homebuyers with a simple accounting of how much their loan is likely to cost them.

headline.main: Consumer Bureau Proposes New Mortgage Disclosure Rules
headline.print_headline: Rules to Clarify Mortgage Costs Are Proposed By U.S. Agency
